c74object.name: mb.modalSynth~
c74object.digest: A modal synthesis instrument that allows users to design timbres exited by impulses.

method.name: midi-note
method.digest: Lists starting with a number trigger a new midi event.

method.name: modes
method.digest: Set the mode frequencies in a list of semitone transpositions

method.name: states
method.digest: Turns modes on and off in a list of ones and zeros

method.name: resonance
method.digest: How highly tuned the modal filters. More resonance is less bandwidth.

method.name: brightness
method.digest: The brighness of the impulse used to exite the modes.
